info.title: ESMF
info.description: A simple API to interact with the Edge Slice Management Function. Supports creating and removing slices across domains. Synchronises itself with other ESMFs to achieve a common goal. Please refer to the topology drawings for further information about the network structures.

from.description: The name of the input domain or host

to.description: The name of the output domain or host

from.description: The name of the input domain or host

to.description: The name of the output domain or host

put.description: Issues a new authentication token in exchange for credentials. Currently requires no credentials, this is up to future implementations.

/slice.description: Endpoint to manage slices by requesters

get.description: Lists all current slices by this requester

parameters.name: auth
parameters.description: The authentication token issued by prior login

200.description: The current list of slices assigned to this requester

put.description: Creates a new slice from one host to another

parameters.name: auth
parameters.description: The authentication token issued by prior login

parameters.name: slice
parameters.description: The slice to reserve. The service will set the slice id.

200.description: The slice has been deployed. Returns the deployed slice parameters, including the fresh id.

404.description: The input or output could not be found

507.description: Insufficient resources by participating domain or requester

parameters.name: auth
parameters.description: The authentication token issued by prior login

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the slice to be deleted.

404.description: The slice could not be found.

/slice_reservation.summary: Manages slice reservations within the two-phase commit protocol between ESMFs
/slice_reservation.description: Endpoint to reserve slice capacity on this domain

get.description: Lists all current slice reservations issued by the requesting ESMF. Used for synchronization purposes.

parameters.name: auth
parameters.description: The authentication token issued by prior login

200.description: The current list of slice reservations assigned to this ESMF.

put.description: Creates a new slice reservation on this domain

parameters.name: auth
parameters.description: The authentication token issued by prior login

parameters.name: slice
parameters.description: The slice to reserve.

404.description: The input or output could not be found

409.description: A slice with this id is already known

507.description: Insufficient resources by participating domain or requester

parameters.name: auth
parameters.description: The authentication token issued by prior login

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the slice reservation to be deleted.

200.description: The slice reservation was successfully deleted.

404.description: The slice reservation could not be found.

/slice_deployment.summary: Manages slice deployments within the two-phase commit protocol between ESMFs
/slice_deployment.description: Endpoint to deploy slices on this domain

get.description: Lists all current slices issued by the requesting ESMF. Used for synchronization purposes.

parameters.name: auth
parameters.description: The authentication token issued by prior login

200.description: The current list of slices assigned to this ESMF.

put.description: Creates a new slice on this domain

parameters.name: auth
parameters.description: The authentication token issued by prior login

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the slice to be deployed.

404.description: The slice reservation could not be found

delete.description: Deletes a slice from this domain

parameters.name: auth
parameters.description: The authentication token issued by prior login

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the slice to be deleted.

404.description: The slice could not be found.

/tunnel_reservation.summary: Manages tunnel reservations within the two-phase commit protocol between ESMFs and CTMFs
/tunnel_reservation.description: Endpoint to reserve tunnel capacity on this domain

get.description: Lists all current tunnel reservations issued by the requesting ESMF. Used for synchronization purposes.

parameters.name: auth
parameters.description: The authentication token issued by prior login

200.description: The current list of tunnel reservations assigned to this ESMF.

put.description: Creates a new tunnel reservation on this domain

parameters.name: auth
parameters.description: The authentication token issued by prior login

parameters.name: tunnel
parameters.description: The tunnel to reserve or alter.

404.description: The input or output could not be found

409.description: A tunnel with this id already exists and source or target do not match

507.description: Insufficient resources by participating domain or requester

parameters.name: auth
parameters.description: The authentication token issued by prior login

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the tunnel reservation to be deleted.

200.description: The tunnel reservation was successfully deleted.

404.description: The tunnel reservation could not be found.

/tunnel_deployment.summary: Manages tunnel deployments within the two-phase commit protocol between ESMFs

parameters.name: auth
parameters.description: The authentication token issued by prior login
